answers.answer: Home BP units are now cheap and accurate.  Get one and do your own readings over time.  Try different times of day, different locations, and using relaxation and imaging pleasant situations for a while before the measurements.  With practice you may even be able to get the readings to go up and down at will.If you can present your Dr. with a set of daily low readings over time, that should settle the issue.tg

question: I was surprised to learn that so many adults avoid taking their blood pressure simply because of the white coat effect.The medical field has failed to take this phenomenon seriously. In many situation physicians simply over prescribe medication when most likey very little medication may be necessary. I take 3 medications: Toprol XL 100mg, Benicar  HCT 40/25, Dynacirc 5mg. Consequently the side effects are overbearing. In addition a report by the British medical authorities have recommended against prescribing diuretics and beta blockers for the great risk in setting of the onset of diabetes.How could one overcome this fear and determine the true blood pressure regardless of ones state of mind? Would a sedative prior to blood pressure being taken be a good advise or will that lower blood pressure artificially?
